title: Life
body: The life we live is a precious gift from God

title: Smiles
body: A lovely smile can take away pain, it can change ones mood

title: Hate
body: it can push you to do what you don't want to do, dried and kills slowly

title: Kindness
body: a little kindness shown can be a great blessing for a life time

title: Be You
body: be yourself live your life for yourself and not to please others

title: Change
body: change is constant, be the change you want to see
